datasets.description: Text with abbreviations and complex punctuation
datasets.text: Dr. Smith went to the U.S.A. in 2020. He visited New York, N.Y. and Los Angeles, Calif. The weather was great! He said, "This is amazing." Then he returned home.
sentences: Dr. Smith went to the U.S.A. in 2020.
He visited New York, N.Y. and Los Angeles, Calif.

datasets.description: Text with decimal numbers and scientific notation
datasets.text: The temperature was 98.6 degrees. The price is $19.99. The value of pi is approximately 3.14159. We measured 2.5 meters.
sentences: The value of pi is approximately 3.14159.

datasets.description: Text with multiple sentence types and quotations
datasets.text: Prof. Johnson asked, "What time is it?" The student replied, "It's 3:00 p.m." They discussed the topic at length. Finally, they agreed!
sentences: Prof. Johnson asked, "What time is it?"
They discussed the topic at length.

datasets.description: Text with titles, honorifics, and addresses
datasets.text: Mr. and Mrs. Brown live on Main St. They work for ABC Inc. Their address is 123 Oak Ave., Suite 4B. They moved there in Jan. 2021.
sentences: Mr. and Mrs. Brown live on Main St.
Their address is 123 Oak Ave., Suite 4B.

datasets.description: Complex text with ellipsis and multiple punctuation
datasets.text: She thought about it... then decided. "Wait!" he exclaimed. "Are you sure?" She nodded. "Yes, I'm certain."
sentences: She thought about it... then decided.
